select decode(drcr_ind , 'D',lcy_amount , 'C',0) Dr_amount , 
decode(drcr_ind , 'C',lcy_amount , 'D',0) , a.* from acvw_all_Ac_entries a
where ac_no in ( '0221730101286819','0221730101345892','0221730101404189','0401730102531641','0401730102816239','0402830102573393','0432830103654316','0501720103813686' ) 
and period_code ='M06' order by ac_no
